abstract: Q&A explains European Union policies called Schengen and Dublin Regulation that have been complicating Continent's response to migrant crisis.
lead_paragraph: Two European policies that loom large in the current crisis are often obscured by the shorthand — “Schengen” and the “Dublin Regulation” — used to refer to them.

headline.main: Explaining the Rules for Migrants: Borders and Asylum
headline.print_headline: What Europe’s Schengen and Dublin Rules Mean for Migrants

snippet: Two European policies that loom large in the current crisis are often obscured by the shorthand — “Schengen” and the “Dublin Regulation” — used to refer to them.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject
